headline: Illinois American Water Plans To Build New Elevated Water Tank on Market Street in Champaign
summary: CHAMPAIGN, Ill., April 28, 2025--Illinois American Water will start construction of $4.5 million water storage tank near Interstate 72 this year; completion in late 2026.

headline: CHGX: Equal-Weight ESG ETF
